caseTitle:
(Review arising out of the judgment dated 26.09.2016
passed by this Court in Const. Petition No.3 of 2014)
tagline: The constitution of Benches is the domain of the Chief Justice and no litigant or lawyer can be permitted to ask that his case be heard by a Bench of his choice. As far as practicable the application for review shall be posted before the same Bench that delivered the judgment or order sought to be reviewed, but subject to the availability and practicability of the Bench.
